pr_title: buildscripts: add missing CI coverage for examples

timeline.message: Cover Android strictmode example build in CI.
Cover jwt-auth example build in CI (gradle + maven), add missing gradle build coverage for tls example.

timeline.bodyText: I don't think the clean does anything. We could delete it from the others as well and not lose anything.
timeline.author: ejona86
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -66,9 +66,14 @@ if [[ -z "${SKIP_TESTS:-}" ]]; then
   popd
   pushd examples/example-hostname
   ../gradlew build $GRADLE_FLAGS
-  mvn verify --batch-mode
+  mvn clean verify --batch-mode

replies.bodyText: Yeah, you are right. Maven is built to a separate target/ directory, it will not use Gradle's result. Deleted those cleans.
replies.author: voidzcy
